poemContent: Ermm, excuuuse me Frau briee Herr Fischer Buzzards in the sea Serum Goo and Slime, locker 253 Now i'm in line, trousers clean, `Stop making that stuuupid voice`! erm, what are you doing boys? Promoting this, promoting that on shiny targets a lokki shat Screaming out, he made a fuss Stomp'd a bee infront of a bus! ei ei ei bzzzzzz nah, that's g- 
